Key Match Events: Netherlands striker Cody Gakpo expects more attacking opportunities due to Germany's playing style
Pre-Game Insights: Cody Gakpo anticipates Germany will play forward and be more open, creating spaces for Netherlands to attack
Ronald Koeman notes the Netherlands faced difficulty against Hungary but improved in the second half with deeper runs and wing spaces
Virgil van Dijk's suspension means the Netherlands must replace him with either Stefan de Vrij or Denzel Dumfries as captain
